text.txt1: Grant worked hard to harvest his beans so he and his family would have enough to eat that winter. His friend Henry let him stack them in his barn where they would dry. Later, he and Tatyana would shell them and cook them for

text.txt1: The table was piled high with food, and on the floor beside
text.txt2: there were crocks, baskets, and a five-quart pail of milk.

text.txt1: Even before they reached town, they could hear a sound like corn popping. Dora asked what
text.txt2: was, and Dad said it was firecrackers.
